interface.name: EAP_DisplayParsingHistoricalCallbackFailure
interface.description: Interface to show the Parsing Historical error for initiator
interface.definition: a!localVariables( local!failedInputParsingFiles: index( ri!processHistoricalTransDetailsResponse, wherecontains( "failed", index(ri!processHistoricalTransDetailsResponse,"hist_parsing_status",null) ), null ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_boxLayout"( style: "ERROR", label: "Input Parsing Error for Request Id: " & ri!requestDetails.requestId, contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: local!failedInputParsingFiles, expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( value: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextHeader"( text : fv!index ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Error in Parsing File : ", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: fv!item.file_name, color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Exception Type", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: fv!item.exception_type, color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Exception Message", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: fv!item.exception_message, color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ) } ) ) } ), }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: "Close", style: "PRIMARY", submit: true(), saveInto: { a!save( ri!requestDetails.requestCurrStatus, "REQ_CLS" ), a!save( ri!requestDetails.updatedBy, loggedInUser() ), a!save( ri!requestDetails.updatedOn, now() ) } ) ) ) )
